name: enefthi-project
description: We have been working hard to develop this NFT/Digital art trading app and while it is not done yet, the code we have so far is a testament to our skills as full-stack developers!

scripts.build: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run build && npm run deploy && echo 'Client Built'
